org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class FSImagePreTransactionalStorageInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSImageStorageInspector
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.FSImagePreTransactionalStorageInspector

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
 class FSImagePreTransactionalStorageInspector
extends FSImageStorageInspector
    Inspects a FSImage storage directory in the "old" (pre-HDFS-1073) format. This format has the following data files: - fsimage - fsimage.ckpt (when checkpoint is being uploaded) - edits - edits.new (when logs are "rolled")

    • Nested Class Summary

        static long readCheckpointTime(Storage.StorageDirectory sd)
                        throws IOException
        Determine the checkpoint time of the specified StorageDirectory
        Parameters:
        sd - StorageDirectory to check
        Returns:
        If file exists and can be read, last checkpoint time. If not, 0L.
        Throws:
        IOException - On errors processing file pointed to by sd
